Title: Relates to the disclosure of online advertisements by electronic cigarette companies
Summary: Requires that all companies that sell electronic cigarettes shall annually disclose to the commissioner of health their online advertising expenditures from the previous fiscal year; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง1399-kk, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to adopting requirements that electronic cigarette companies disclose online advertisements
